forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. S winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 49F. SW winds shifting to N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 46F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
